lead_paragraph: FINE--Ellen Ginder. Beloved matriarch and tenacious businesswoman. Widow of her love Sidney L. Weinberg. Devoted mother, grandmother, sister and friend. Ellen is survived by her children Andrew, Elizabeth and Jean. Her grandchildren Alex, Sidney, Charlotte, Abigail, Annika and Margot. She is also survived by her siblings Mary, Richard, Don and John. Her son-in-law Kyle Czepiel and daughter- in-law Ayesha Fine. Visitation will be held at Frank E Campbell "The Funeral Chapel," 81st Street and Madison Ave., on Friday 2-5pm / 7-9pm. Mass of Christian Burial will be held at St. Jean Baptiste, E. 76th Street and Lexington Ave., on Saturday at 9:30am. Interment to follow at Most Holy Trinity Cemetery, East Hampton, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FINE, ELLEN GINDER
